patthana1.12:188.1: Asekkho ca nevasekkhanāsekkho ca dhammā asekkhassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo …pe…. (Dve pañhā kātabbā, sekkhasadisā.)
patthana1.12:189.1_0: Hetuyā satta, ārammaṇe pañca, adhipatiyā nava, anantare aṭṭha, samanantare aṭṭha,
patthana1.12:189.1_1: sahajāte nava, aññamaññe tīṇi, nissaye terasa, upanissaye aṭṭha, purejāte tīṇi, pacchājāte
patthana1.12:189.1_2: tīṇi, āsevane dve, kamme aṭṭha, vipāke āhāre indriye jhāne magge satta, sampayutte
patthana1.12:189.1_3: tīṇi, vippayutte pañca, atthiyā terasa, natthiyā aṭṭha, vigate aṭṭha, avigate terasa. (Evaṁ gaṇetabbaṁ.)

patthana1.12:205.1_0: Nahetuyā cuddasa, naārammaṇe naadhipatiyā naanantare nasamanantare cuddasa, nasahajāte
patthana1.12:205.1_1: dasa, naaññamaññe dasa, nanissaye dasa, naupanissaye terasa, napurejāte dvādasa,
patthana1.12:205.1_2: napacchājāte cuddasa, naāsevane nakamme cuddasa, navipāke dvādasa, naāhāre naindriye
patthana1.12:205.1_3: najhāne namagge cuddasa, nasampayutte dasa, navippayutte aṭṭha, noatthiyā aṭṭha,
patthana1.12:205.1_4: nonatthiyā cuddasa, novigate cuddasa, noavigate aṭṭha. (Evaṁ gaṇetabbaṁ.)
patthana1.12:207.1_0: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe satta, naadhipatiyā satta, naanantare satta, nasamanantare
patthana1.12:207.1_1: satta, naaññamaññe tīṇi, naupanissaye napurejāte napacchājāte naāsevane nakamme satta,
patthana1.12:207.1_2: navipāke cattāri, naāhāre naindriye najhāne namagge satta, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte
patthana1.12:207.1_3: tīṇi, nonatthiyā satta, novigate satta. (Evaṁ gaṇetabbaṁ.)
